title: Jubaan Hit Masala public online store (India) with categories, orders, and payments

requirements.text: Create a public storefront for the brand name "Jubaan Hit Masala" with a homepage that highlights the brand, featured products, and key actions (Browse Products, View Cart, Track Order). All user-facing text must be in English.

quotes: Category food category masala brand name jubaan hit masala app  Sona level payment order online store all India publis app

acceptanceCriteria: The app has a public landing/home page that clearly displays the brand name "Jubaan Hit Masala".
Users can navigate from the homepage to browse products and view the cart.
All visible UI strings are in English.

requirements.text: Implement product catalog browsing with categories for food/masala items, including category listing, product listing, and product detail pages showing name, price, description, and optional image.

quotes: Category food category masala brand name jubaan hit masala app

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to list categories and list products (optionally filtered by category) and fetch a product by id.
Frontend provides pages/views for categories, product list, and product details.
A product has at minimum: id, name, categoryId, price, description, and imageUrl (optional).

requirements.text: Add cart and checkout flow: users can add/remove items, adjust quantities, see order totals, and place an order with customer details (name, phone, delivery address, city, state, PIN code).

quotes: payment order online store all India publis app

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add items to cart from product list/detail and modify quantities in the cart.
Checkout form collects name, phone, address, city, state, and PIN code.
Placing an order creates an order record in the backend and returns an order id to the frontend.
Frontend shows an order confirmation view with the order id and summary.

requirements.text: Implement a payment selection and order payment status model that supports at least: Cash on Delivery and Manual UPI payment (user submits a payment reference/UTR). Include a clear admin-only method (backend) to mark an order as Paid/Confirmed without relying on third-party payment processors.

quotes: Sona level payment order online store

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout includes a payment method selector with at least: Cash on Delivery, UPI (Manual).
If UPI (Manual) is selected, the UI collects a payment reference/UTR field (English label).
Order records store paymentMethod and paymentStatus (e.g., Pending, Paid, Failed/Cancelled).
Backend provides an authenticated/admin-only update method to set paymentStatus for an order (e.g., mark paid/confirmed).

requirements.text: Add order lookup/tracking for customers using an order id and phone number to view order status, payment status, and items summary (no real-time updates required).

quotes: order online store all India publis app

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend includes a "Track Order" page where a user enters order id and phone number.
Backend provides a query method that returns order details only when order id + phone number match.
Returned order details include status, paymentStatus, items, and totals.

requirements.text: Provide a minimal admin interface protected by Internet Identity login to manage catalog and orders: create/edit categories and products, view orders list, and update order status/payment status.

quotes: online store all India publis app

acceptanceCriteria: There is an admin route/view that requires Internet Identity authentication.
Admin can create/edit/delete categories and products (or at minimum create/edit).
Admin can view a list of orders and open an order to update order status and payment status.
Non-authenticated users cannot access admin functions.

requirements.text: Define a coherent visual theme for the "Jubaan Hit Masala" brand UI (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across pages. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: App uses a consistent theme across homepage, catalog, cart, checkout, and tracking pages.
Primary brand colors are not blue/purple.
UI components are consistently styled (buttons, cards, forms, headings).

requirements.text: Seed the app with initial demo data for an India-wide masala/food store (several categories and several products per category) so the storefront is usable immediately after deployment.

quotes: Category food category masala ... all India publis app

acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, the catalog displays multiple categories and products without requiring admin setup.
Seed data includes realistic product names, descriptions, and prices (in INR as display currency).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
Use English for any user-facing text in the app.
nonGoals: Integration with third-party payment gateways or automatic payment verification.
Real-time order updates, chat, push notifications, or email/SMS notifications.
Advanced shipping rate calculations, courier integrations, or GPS/map features.

required: Brand logo with a bold, traditional Indian spice aesthetic (jubaan-hit-masala-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Homepage hero banner with spices/masala imagery and warm tones (jubaan-hit-masala-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
